greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of rooted hypertrees on n unlabeled nodes with k edges, (0 <= k < n).
comment: Equivalently, the number of rooted connected graphs on n unlabeled nodes with k blocks where every block is a complete graph.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275
program: EulerMT(u)={my(n=#u, p=x*Ser(u), vars=variables(p)); Vec(exp( sum(i=1, n, substvec(p + O(x*x^(n\i)), vars, apply(v->v^i,vars))/i ))-1)}
R(n)={my(v=[1]); for(i=2, n, v=concat([1], EulerMT(y*EulerMT(v)))); [Vecrev(p) | p <- v]}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 29 2018
